bibl.title: Alcibiades in the Rhetorical Tradition. P. Strass. Inv. Gr. 2346 (= P2 2497).
bibl.note: P. Stras. Inv. 2346 (= Pack2 2497). Text, notes and translation. The papyrus preserves four fragmentary columns from a complete speech, or perhaps from selected arguments for a speech, about Alcibiades. This rhetorical exercise could be the product of a native Latin speaker undergoing Greek rhetorical training.
bibl.seg: STEPHENS Susan, Alcibiades in the Rhetorical Tradition. P. Strass. Inv. Gr. 2346 (= P2 2497).
